entries.name: Jewel Changi Airport
entries.summary: Nature-themed lifestyle complex connecting all Changi Airport terminals.
entries.details: Jewel spans 10 stories around a central garden. It blends retail, dining, attractions, and aviation services. The indoor Forest Valley creates a lush walking trail while the top levels host Canopy Park experiences.

sources.note: Based on Changi Airport Group descriptions.

entries.name: HSBC Rain Vortex
entries.summary: 40-meter indoor waterfall and the icon of Jewel's Forest Valley.
entries.details: Water cascades from the skylight through seven levels to the basement garden. Nightly light-and-sound shows typically run every hour from early evening. Mist and lighting schedules can change for events or maintenance.

sources.note: Visitor observations on show timing variability.

entries.name: Canopy Park
entries.summary: Top-level play attractions such as Sky Nets, Discovery Slides, and Foggy Bowls.
entries.details: Tickets are required for most play areas. Operating hours usually mirror Jewel's retail hours, but individual attractions may close for safety checks. Bundled passes let guests mix multiple experiences; check onsite boards for current pricing.

entries.name: Dining in Shiseido Forest Valley
entries.summary: Casual cafes and grab-and-go spots tucked among the greenery.
entries.details: Expect quick-service cafes with flexible menus. Seasonal pop-ups appear during travel peaks. Table availability shifts throughout the day, so mid-afternoon is usually quieter.

sources.note: Compiled from local visit notes, availability may vary.

entries.name: Airport Transport Links
entries.summary: Jewel connects to Terminals 1, 2, and 3 via pedestrian bridges and shuttles.
entries.details: The Arrival Hall link bridges on Level 2 offer the quickest walk to Terminals 1 and 2. For Terminal 4, use the shuttle bus from Terminal 2. Allow extra time during peak departure banks.

sources.note: Airport advisories; schedules subject to change.
